name: HorrorBot
description:
Version Alpha Release:

Explore the depths of the Underground to see what hiddent things you can find... but your not alone as a Dark figure chases, cameras that can spot you, and many puzzles to solve to get to other areas

Use WASD To move, left and right click for doors, make sure to be within a close range to pick up items

Alpha 1.2 is Here!:

The game Now has an Ending, 2 Infact!, Graphical Improvements, And new things to Find! have fun ~~Herbanana Games
